doc.field: Series II. International and Domestic Events
Series II. International and Domestic Events

This large series contains correspondence, programs, itineraries, brochures, packets, press, photographs, audio cassette tapes, vhs tapes, video recordings, images of conferences, summits, forums, dialogues, meetings and other domestic and international events that Rabbi Arthur Schneier attended about creating interreligious peace and expanding human rights. While the bulk of the material in this series comes from Rabbi Schneier's trips to foreign countries, but it also contains events held at PES. Of note in this series are video recordings, images, and correspondence of Pope Benedict XVI's visit to PES, the first papal visit to an American Synagogue, and anniversary events celebrating Rabbi Arthur Schneier's vocational work as the senior rabbi of PES. Included in this series are programs, speech drafts, video recordings, and photographs of Rabbi Arthur Schneier speaking at many Holocaust Remembrance Commemorative Events. Rabbi Arthur Schneier was also the recipient of several domestic and international awards which are documented here in correspondence, photographs, images, video recordings, and programs. Some material in this series is in French, German, Hungarian, Italian, Spanish, or Hebrew. There are born-digital media--video, image, document files--in this series.
